Question: Prophesee CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Prophesee

GenX320 Event-Based Metavision® Sensor

- Industry's smallest and most power-efficient event-based vision sensor
- Tiny 3x4mm die size
- Specifically developed for integration into ultra-low-power Edge AI vision devices
- Enables integration into AR/VR headsets, security systems, touchless displays, and always-on smart IoT devices
- Offers >10,000 fps equivalent temporal precision, >120 dB dynamic range, and <10mW power efficiency
- Mimics human eye and brain function for improved efficiency in autonomous vehicles, industrial automation, IoT, mobile, and AR/VR applications
Summary_cn:
Prophesee

GenX320事件驱动Metavision®传感器

- 业界最小、功耗最低的事件驱动视觉传感器
- 小巧的3x4mm芯片尺寸
- 专门为超低功耗边缘人工智能视觉设备集成而开发
- 可集成到增强现实/虚拟现实头戴设备、安防系统、非接触式显示器和一直开启的智能物联网设备中
- 提供>10,000 fps的时间精度，>120 dB的动态范围，<10mW的功耗效率
- 模仿人眼和大脑的功能，提高自动驾驶车辆、工业自动化、物联网、移动和增强现实/虚拟现实应用的效率
